TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

summary.span: 为 和 类的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the and classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Result As RecognitionResult

summary.span: 获取所模拟识别的结果。

span.span: Gets the results of emulated recognition.

value.span: 有关识别结果的详细信息，如果发生错误，则为 。

span.span: Detailed information about the results of recognition, or if an error occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象派生自并且包含有关识别操作返回的短语的完整信息。The object derives from and contains full information about a phrase returned by a recognition operation. 你可以获取关闭来自所有识别候选项列表属性。You can obtain a list off all the recognition candidates from the property. 如果识别器遇到未识别操作期间的异常属性设置为异常和属性设置为`null`。If recognizer encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the property is set to the exception and the property is set to `null`.
